field_descriptions.category: Exactly one category from the predefined list (case-sensitive match required)
field_descriptions.confidence_score: Decimal number between 0.00 and 1.00 indicating classification certainty
field_descriptions.key_evidence: Object containing three arrays: message_evidence, shipping_evidence, timeline_evidence
field_descriptions.reasoning: Object containing three arrays: primary_factors, supporting_evidence, contradicting_evidence

category.description: Exactly one category from the predefined list (case-sensitive match required)

confidence_score.description: Decimal number between 0.00 and 1.00 indicating classification certainty

key_evidence.description: Object containing three arrays of evidence from different sources

message_evidence.description: Direct quotes from dialogue with speaker identification

reasoning.description: Object containing three arrays explaining the classification decision

contradicting_evidence.description: Evidence that contradicts the classification (use empty array if none)

primary_factors.description: Main reasons supporting the selected category

supporting_evidence.description: Additional evidence that strengthens the classification

validation_requirements: Category must match exactly from predefined list
Confidence score must be number between 0.0 and 1.0
All required fields must be present
key_evidence and reasoning must be objects with nested arrays
evidence_validation_rules: Message Evidence must include direct quotes with speaker identification
Shipping Evidence must include tracking events with timestamps
Timeline Evidence must show chronological sequence of events
All evidence must reference specific content from input data
formatting_rules: Output MUST be valid, parseable JSON
Use double quotes for all strings, not single quotes
Do not include any text before the opening { or after the closing }
Do not include markdown code fences (```) around the JSON
Ensure all arrays and objects are properly closed
Use empty arrays [] for missing values, not null or empty strings
Ensure proper escaping of special characters in strings

message_evidence: [BUYER]: Hello, I have not received my package, but I see the order shows that it has been delivered, why?
[BUYER]: But I did not find any package, please refund me, thank you
shipping_evidence: [Event Time]: 2025-02-21T17:40:49.323Z [Ship Track Event]: Delivered to customer
No further shipping events after delivery confirmation

primary_factors: Tracking shows package was delivered successfully
Buyer explicitly states they did not receive the package after delivery scan
supporting_evidence: Buyer requests refund due to missing package
No evidence of buyer receiving wrong/defective item
